data.oai_dc:dc: POD! Bird data for San Francisco Bay-Delta (Christmas Bird Count_ National Audubon Society)

The Christmas Bird Count is organized by the National Audubon Society. Available bird data for the Christmas Bird Counts obtained from Count Data by areas (by Count Circles): http://www.audubon.org/bird/cbc/hr/Count circles are mapped in:http://www.stanislausbirds.org/Events/california_cbc_circles.htmBased on the above map I selected data for the locations included in theDelta-Suisun Bay/Marsh (the circle code is indicated in the file name,after the name (e.g. CARC, CASM, CAEC, CABE, CAST).The attached PDF explains each of the colums in the files.As you will see data are sporadic but at least give you an idea ofcountsper species per unit of time.
